mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD (TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, CREATED_AT) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE BNO > 0 ORDER BY BNO DESC, CREATED_AT DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
SELECT COUNT(BNO) FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE BNO > 0
